mapper.select: select * from party where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') ;
mapper.insert: insert into party( id, name, explanation, created, target, pay_cycle, pay_date, pay_amount, image, start_date, end_date, destination, available, exit_fee ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{explanation}, #{created}, #{target}, #{payCycle}, #{payDate}, #{payAmount}, #{image}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{destination}, #{available}, #{exitFee} )
mapper.update: update party set name = #{name}, explanation = #{explanation}, created = #{created}, target = #{target}, pay_cycle = #{payCycle}, pay_date = #{payDate}, pay_amount = #{payAmount}, image = #{image}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, destination = #{destination}, available = #{available}, exit_fee = #{exitFee} where id = #{id}
